mapper.select: SELECT C.CUST_ID as custId , FC.FAMILY_CUST_NICKNAME as familyCustNickname , FC.FAMILY_CUST_EMAIL as familyCustEmail , FC.FAMILY_CUST_ADDR as familyCustAddr , FAMILY_CUST_ADDR_SI as familyCustAddrSi , ZIP_CODE1 as zipCode1 , ZIP_CODE2 as zipCode2 , FAMILY_CUST_ADDR_GUGUN as familyCustAddrGugun , FAMILY_CUST_ADDR_DONG as familyCustAddrDong , C.CUST_PASSWORD as custPassword , SC.SC_CUST_GUBUN as scCustGubun , SC.SC_CUST_EMAIL as scCustEmail FROM CUSTOM C INNER JOIN FAMILY_CUSTOM FC ON C.FAMILY_CUST_NO = FC.FAMILY_CUST_NO AND FC.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN SOCIAL_CUSTOM SC ON FC.FAMILY_CUST_NO = SC.FAMILY_CUST_NO AND SC.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE FC.FAMILY_CUST_NO = #{familyCustNo} AND C.USE_YN = 'Y'
select CUST_PASSWORD as custPassword from CUSTOM where FAMILY_CUST_NO = #{familyCustNo} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT SC_CUST_NO as scCustNo , IFNULL(FAMILY_CUST_NO, 0) as familyCustNo FROM SOCIAL_CUSTOM WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND SC_CUST_GUBUN = #{scCustGubun} /* 가변 */ AND SC_CUST_ID = #{scCustId} LIMIT 1;
